full_description:
Tucano Vario BKVAR BackPack Black

Tucano Vario BKVAR BackPack is designed for MacBook Pro 16" and Laptop 15.6". It's a large, compact backpack, suitable for both students and professionals. It has a section inside the main compartment, purposely padded to protect the device from any impact. The front compartment is equipped with a retainer organised into specific pockets for your smartphone (up to 5.5"), power bank, pens, business cards and other accessories. A quick-access pocket is located on the front and one on the back. There is a security zip pocket where you can insert your wallet and other valuable things to keep them safe while you are out and about. On the sides of the backpack, there are two convenient mesh pockets for carrying your water bottle and umbrella. On the rear panel there is a useful band for trolley transport. It is a very convinient backpack for laptops. It has 2 years of warranty.

Tucano Forte Backpack for 14" Laptop

Tucano Forte Backpack is made entirely of recycled plastic bottle fabric. This eco-friendly bag accommodates laptops up to 14" and MacBooks up to 14". The interior is lined and padded, with a protective pocket for your laptop or tablet. The front has an external pocket, and the back has adjustable shoulder straps and a band for attaching to the trolley. The backpack has two comfortable pockets on the side for an umbrella and a water bottle. This Laptop bag is a perfect option for protecting your laptop from any kind of external damage.

full_description:
Tucano Tugo BKTUG-L-B 17.3" Cabin Luggage Travel or Laptop Large Backpack Blue

Tucano Tugo BKTUG-L-B Durable backpack designed to fit the maximum size of carry-on luggage allowed by airlines (IATA). This backpack has two convenient front pockets that are ideal for storing travel accessories, and a padded rear compartment. This Tucano Tugo BKTUG-L-B Backpack allows for quick access to your laptop, which makes airport checks faster. The main compartment has a capacity of over 35 litres, and is perfect to store everything you need while travelling. In this backpack, the zip pulls of the main compartment are also compatible with use of a padlock, so as to always be sure to protect its content. Included are 4 adjustable straps on the sides of the backpack, a chest strap and two sturdy handles to assist in placing the backpack in the overhead bins in planes and trains. Here used water-repellent material. 2 zippered pockets on the front with Lockable zippers on main compartment (lock not included) of this backpack. It is compatible with 15" MacBook Pro, 17" Notebook with 38.5L Capacity. This latest stylish Tucano Tugo BKTUG-L-B 17.3" Cabin Luggage Travel or Laptop Large Backpack has 02 years warranty.
